title: Frax
description:
- Frax is now Universal! iPhone and iPad versions have been consolidated into a single app.
- New Textures! Now you can add a third texture component to the original two.
- New Effects! Apply swirling vortices to your Julia set fractals.
- New Shapes! Cubic Mandelbrot and Julia families to explore.
- See ‘Featured’ preset category for examples of the new effects!
- Many bug fixes and improvements.
